title: Energy
description: Forbes is a leading source for reliable news and updated analysis on Energy. Read the breaking Energy coverage and top headlines on Forbes.com
cleaned_text: Forests To Save The Planet? Maybe Not As Crazy As It Sounds Kodama Systems is betting it can reduce carbon dioxide in the air by chopping down and burying trees. Now if only Uncle Sam would get on board with tax credits, too. Meet The Under 30s Powering The Future Of Energy And Sustainability and
